verses.verse: How doth the city <WH5892> sit <WH3427> solitary <WH910>, that was full <WH7227> of people <WH5971>! She is become as a widow <WH490>, that was great <WH7227> among the nations <WH1471>! She that was a princess <WH8282> among the provinces <WH4082> is become tributary <WH4522>!

She weepeth <WH1058> sore <WH1058> in the night <WH3915>, and her tears <WH1832> are on her cheeks <WH3895>; Among all her lovers <WH157> she hath none to comfort <WH5162> her <WH7453>: All her friends have dealt treacherously <WH898> with her <WH341>; they are become her enemies.

Judah <WH3063> is gone into captivity <WH1540> because of affliction <WH6040>, and because of great <WH7230> servitude <WH5656>; She dwelleth <WH3427> among the nations <WH1471>, she findeth <WH4672> no rest <WH4494>: All her persecutors <WH7291> overtook <WH5381> her within the straits <WH4712>.

The ways <WH1870> of Zion <WH6726> do mourn <WH57>, because none come <WH935> to the solemn assembly <WH4150>; All her gates <WH8179> are desolate <WH8074>, her priests <WH3548> do sigh <WH584>: Her virgins <WH1330> are afflicted <WH3013>, and she herself is in bitterness <WH4843>.

Her adversaries <WH6862> are become the head <WH7218>, her enemies <WH341> prosper <WH7951>; For Jehovah <WH3068> hath afflicted <WH3013> her for the multitude <WH7230> of her transgressions <WH6588>: Her young children <WH5768> are gone <WH1980> into captivity <WH7628> before <WH6440> the adversary <WH6862>.

And from the daughter <WH1323> of Zion <WH6726> all her majesty <WH1926> is departed <WH3318>: Her princes <WH8269> are become like harts <WH354> that find <WH4672> no pasture <WH4829>, And they are gone <WH3212> without strength <WH3581> before <WH6440> the pursuer <WH7291>.

Jerusalem <WH3389> remembereth <WH2142> in the days <WH3117> of her affliction <WH6040> and of her miseries <WH4788> all her pleasant things <WH4262> that were from the days <WH3117> of old <WH6924>: When her people <WH5971> fell <WH5307> into the hand <WH3027> of the adversary <WH6862>, and none did help <WH5826> her <WH6862>, The adversaries saw <WH7200> her <WH7832>, they did mock at her desolations <WH4868>.

Jerusalem <WH3389> hath grievously <WH2399> sinned <WH2398>; therefore she is become <WH5206> as an unclean thing <WH3513>; All that honored her despise <WH2107> her <WH7200>, because they have seen her nakedness <WH6172>: Yea <WH584>, she sigheth, and turneth <WH7725> backward <WH268>.

Her filthiness <WH2932> was in her skirts <WH7757>; she remembered <WH2142> not her latter end <WH319>; Therefore is she come down <WH3381> wonderfully <WH6382>; she hath no comforter <WH5162>: Behold <WH7200>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, my affliction <WH6040>; for the enemy <WH341> hath magnified himself <WH1431>.

The adversary <WH6862> hath spread out <WH6566> his hand <WH3027> upon all her pleasant things <WH4261>: For she hath seen <WH7200> that the nations <WH1471> are entered <WH935> into her sanctuary <WH4720>, Concerning whom thou didst command <WH6680> that they should not enter <WH935> into thine assembly <WH6951>.

All her people <WH5971> sigh <WH584>, they seek <WH1245> bread <WH3899>; They have given <WH5414> their pleasant things <WH4261> for food <WH400> to refresh <WH7725> the soul <WH5315>: See <WH7200>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, and behold <WH5027>; for I am become abject <WH2151>.

Is it nothing to you <WH5674>, all ye that pass by <WH1870>? Behold <WH5027>, and see <WH7200> if there be <WH3426> any sorrow <WH4341> like unto my sorrow <WH4341>, which is brought <WH5953> upon me <WH3068>, Wherewith Jehovah hath afflicted <WH3013> me in the day <WH3117> of his fierce <WH2740> anger <WH639>.

From on high <WH4791> hath he sent <WH7971> fire <WH784> into my bones <WH6106>, and it prevaileth <WH7287> against them <WH6566>; He hath spread a net <WH7568> for my feet <WH7272>, he hath turned <WH7725> me back <WH268>: He hath made <WH5414> me desolate <WH8074> and faint <WH1739> all the day <WH3117>.

The yoke <WH5923> of my transgressions <WH6588> is bound <WH8244> by his hand <WH3027>; They are knit <WH8276> together <WH5927>, they are come up upon my neck <WH6677>; He hath made my strength <WH3581> to fail <WH3782>: The Lord <WH136> hath delivered <WH5414> me into their hands <WH3027>, against whom I am not able <WH3201> to stand <WH6965>.

The Lord <WH136> hath set at nought <WH5541> all my mighty <WH47> men in the midst <WH7130> of me <WH7121>; He hath called a solemn assembly <WH4150> against me to crush <WH7665> my young men <WH970>: The Lord <WH136> hath trodden <WH1869> as in a winepress <WH1660> the virgin <WH1330> daughter <WH1323> of Judah <WH3063>.

For these things I weep <WH1058>; mine eye <WH5869>, mine eye <WH5869> runneth down <WH3381> with water <WH4325>; Because the comforter <WH5162> that should refresh <WH7725> my soul <WH5315> is far <WH7368> from me <WH1121>: My children are desolate <WH8074>, because the enemy <WH341> hath prevailed <WH1396>.

Zion <WH6726> spreadeth forth <WH6566> her hands <WH3027>; there is none to comfort <WH5162> her <WH3068>; Jehovah hath commanded <WH6680> concerning Jacob <WH3290>, that they that are round about <WH5439> him should be his adversaries <WH6862>: Jerusalem <WH3389> is among them as an unclean thing <WH5079>.

Jehovah <WH3068> is righteous <WH6662>; for I have rebelled <WH4784> against his commandment <WH6310>: Hear <WH8085>, I pray you <WH5971>, all ye peoples, and behold <WH7200> my sorrow <WH4341>: My virgins <WH1330> and my young men <WH970> are gone <WH1980> into captivity <WH7628>.

I called <WH7121> for my lovers <WH157>, but they deceived <WH7411> me <WH3548>: My priests and mine elders <WH2205> gave up the ghost <WH1478> in the city <WH5892>, While they sought <WH1245> them food <WH400> to refresh <WH7725> their souls <WH5315>.

Behold <WH7200>, O Jehovah <WH3068>; for I am in distress <WH6887>; my heart <WH4578> is troubled <WH2560>; My heart <WH3820> is turned <WH2015> within <WH7130> me <WH4784>; for I have grievously rebelled <WH4784>: Abroad <WH2351> the sword <WH2719> bereaveth <WH7921>, at home <WH1004> there is as death <WH4194>.

They have heard <WH8085> that I sigh <WH584>; there is none to comfort <WH5162> me <WH341>; all mine enemies have heard <WH8085> of my trouble <WH7451>; they are glad <WH7797> that thou hast done <WH6213> it <WH935>: Thou wilt bring the day <WH3117> that thou hast proclaimed <WH7121>, and they shall be like unto me <WH3644>.

Let all their wickedness <WH7451> come <WH935> before <WH6440> thee <WH5953>; And do unto them <WH5953>, as thou hast done unto me for all my transgressions <WH6588>: For my sighs <WH585> are many <WH7227>, and my heart <WH3820> is faint <WH1742>.
